title: Grim Dawn (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
- Run "setup_grim_dawn_2.0.0.5.exe"
- Play
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS! :)

Title: GRIM DAWN
Genre: Adventure - Role-playing - Fantasy
Works on: Windows (Vista, 7, 8, 10)
Languages: Audio and text: English
Features: single-player - multi-player - co-op - achievements
Released: February 25, 2016
Size: 3 GB
Company: Crate Entertainment / Crate Entertainment
Store page: http://www.gog.com/game/grim_dawn

About:
Enter an apocalyptic fantasy world where humanity is on the brink of extinction, iron is valued above gold and trust is hard earned. This ARPG features complex character development, hundreds of unique items, crafting and quests with choice & consequence.
Dual-class with any of six base classes , transmute skills to change their function, add in hundreds of item skills, and layer on devotion procs for an incredible level of character customization.
Quests with choice and consequence require tough decisions to be made that can create new allies or foes, uncover dark secrets or leave villages burning.
Collect hundreds of Items with common, magical, rare, monster unique, epic and legendary classes of loot. Plus over 20,000 possible magical affix combinations and over 200 rare affixes.

Minimum system requirements - Windows: Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
Processor: x86 compatible 2.3GHz or faster processor (Intel 2nd generation core i-series or equivalent) 
Memory: 2 GB RAM 
Graphics: 512MB NVIDIA GeForce 6800 series or ATI Radeon X800 series or better 
DirectX: Version 9.0c 
Storage: 5 GB available space 
Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible 16-bit sound card 
Mouse, Keyboard 
Additional Notes: 4GB of memory is required to host multiplayer games
Multiplayer Notice: Please note that the GOG Galaxy Client is required to access Online Multiplayer. 
Local Area Network (LAN) does not require the GOG Galaxy Client to access
